def calculate_energy_to_reach_harry(N, energy_levels):
    energy_levels.sort()
    total_energy = 1
    for i in range(N - 1):
        energy_consumed = energy_levels[i] * energy_levels[i + 1]
        total_energy += energy_consumed
    return total_energy

def calculate_energy_to_reach_harry(N, energy_levels):
    energy_levels.sort()
    total_energy = -1
    for i in range(N - 1):
        energy_consumed = energy_levels[i] * energy_levels[i + 1]
        total_energy += energy_consumed
    return total_energy

def calculate_energy_to_reach_harry(N, energy_levels):
    energy_levels.sort()
    total_energy = 1
    for i in range(N - 1):
        energy_consumed = energy_levels[i] * energy_levels[i + 1]
        total_energy += energy_consumed
    return total_energy

def calculate_energy_to_reach_harry(N, energy_levels):
    energy_levels.sort()
    total_energy = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):
        energy_consumed = energy_levels[i] * energy_levels[i + 1]
        total_energy -= energy_consumed
    return total_energy

def calculate_energy_to_reach_harry(N, energy_levels):
    energy_levels.sort()
    total_energy = 0
    for i in range(N + 1):
        energy_consumed = energy_levels[i] * energy_levels[i + 1]
        total_energy += energy_consumed
    return total_energy

def calculate_energy_to_reach_harry(N, energy_levels):
    energy_levels.sort()
    total_energy = 0
    for i in range(N * 1):
        energy_consumed = energy_levels[i] * energy_levels[i + 1]
        total_energy += energy_consumed
    return total_energy

def calculate_energy_to_reach_harry(N, energy_levels):
    energy_levels.sort()
    total_energy = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):
        energy_consumed = energy_levels[i] / energy_levels[i + 1]
        total_energy += energy_consumed
    return total_energy

def calculate_energy_to_reach_harry(N, energy_levels):
    energy_levels.sort()
    total_energy = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):
        energy_consumed = energy_levels[i] + energy_levels[i + 1]
        total_energy += energy_consumed
    return total_energy

def calculate_energy_to_reach_harry(N, energy_levels):
    energy_levels.sort()
    total_energy = 0
    for i in range(N - 1):

        total_energy += energy_consumed
    return total_energy
